data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Sibi access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sibi, Baluchistan, Pakistan

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Sibi, Baluchistan, Pakistan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Sibi, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sibi, Baluchistan, Pakistan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Vaddar (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Vaddar (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Sibi, Baluchistan, Pakistan. Please, stir the 279 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, please defend the 279 believers in Sibi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sibi, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
